name: DistantColony #LD50
description:
Distant Colony
This game was made for LudumDare 50 #LD50 Compo in 48 hours

The theme was **Delay the inevitable**

If its still time please rate :)
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/distant-colony

Try to survive in this forsaken sector

How to play:

Place buildings using mouse, Choose a building from the bottom right menu.

**LEFT MOUSE BUTTON** to place building

**MIDDLE MOUSE BUTTON** or **TAB** to change building orientation

Move around the map with **WASD**, **ARROW KEYS** and you can also **DRAG WITH RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON**

Zoom using **MOUSE SCROLL** or **PAGE UP/PAGE DOWN**

STOP/START game time with BOTTOM LEFT MENU

For pause menu use **ESCAPE KEY**

**BIGGER ORE VEINS HAVE MORE UNITS OF ORE**

NOW GO GET THAT ORE!

Tools used:

- Godot Engine 3.5beta3

- Blender 3.1.2

- Krita

Font used:

Kenney Future Narrow: www.kenney.nl

Music tool:

beepbox.co
